function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased use of airfreighting due to high demand for N95 masks","Impact":"Reduction in emissions linked to traditional shipping was observed","Mitigation":"Developing sustainable supply chain strategies and increasing production capacity of N95 masks","Technologies":"Sustainable supply chain management systems, 3D printing technology for mask production","People":"Healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"National interests and protectionism as a by-product of COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Disruption of global value chains and trade relationships","Mitigation":"Promoting international cooperation and trade agreements, diversifying sources of goods and materials","Technologies":"Blockchain for transparent supply chain management, trade finance platforms","People":"Government officials, policymakers, trade organizations","Owner":"Government agencies, international trade organizations"},{"Description":"Consumer behavior change leading to panic buying of essential goods","Impact":"Disruption of supply chains and potential shortages of essential products","Mitigation":"Promoting responsible consumer behavior, implementing inventory management systems, and ensuring fair distribution of essential goods","Technologies":"Inventory management software, demand forecasting tools, online purchasing platforms","People":"Consumers, retailers, suppliers","Owner":"Retailers, government regulators"}]}
